title: Rain Seeking Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Rain Seeking Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Rain Seeking Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 169
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ اسْقِنَا غَيْثاً مُغِيثاً مَرِيئاً مَرِيعاً، نَافِعاً غَيْرَ ضَارٍّ، عَاجِلاً غَيْرَ آجِلٍ)).
items.transliteration: Allahummas-qina ghaythan mugheethan maree-an mureeAAan, nafiAAan, ghayra dar, AAajilan ghayra ajil.
items.translation: O Allah, send upon us helpful, wholesome and healthy rain, beneficial not harmful rain, now, not later.

items.title: Dua 170
items.transliteration: Allahumma aghithna, allahumma aghithna, allahumma aghithna.
items.translation: O Allah, relieve us, O Allah, relieve us, O Allah, relieve us.

items.title: Dua 171
items.arabic: ((اللَّهُمَّ اسْقِ عِبَادَكَ، وَبَهَائِمَكَ، وَانْشُرْ رَحْمَتَكَ، وَأَحْيِي بَلَدَكَ الْمَيِّتَ)).
items.transliteration: Allahummas-qi AAibadak, wabaha-imak, wanshur rahmatak, wa-ahyi baladakal-mayyit.
items.translation: O Allah, provide water for Your servants and Your cattle, spread out Your mercy and resurrect Your dead land.

description_ar: من الأذكار والأدعية الصحيحة: دعاء المطر
